title: Structural-Functional Modeling-Based Education for Mechanical Engineering Major Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered educational environment using digital devices, emphasizing real-world application cases tailored to professional learners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mechanical system design problems using structural-functional modeling and propose solutions.
Learners can develop evaluation criteria for mechanical engineering expertise by applying an integrated information-task-assessment model.
Learners can implement mechanical engineering competencies aligned with industrial demands under organizational-educational conditions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
